snippet: Kung Hpan, 27, a sometime-law student and full-time heroin addict in Myanmar, first stops by a friend’s house to get high, then he heads to the jade mines to work so he can pay for it.
abstract: Kung Hpan, 27, a sometime-law student and full-time heroin addict in Myanmar, first stops by a friend’s house to get high, then he heads to the jade mines to work so he can pay for it.

headline.main: An Addict on the Jade Trail to China
